bag - of - words models.from sentence: As can be seen from the for long documents , bag - of - words models perform quite well and it is difficult to improve upon them using word vectors .

combination of two models.from sentence: The combination of two models yields an improvement approximately 1.5 % in terms of error rates .

is.from sentence: The method described in this paper is the only approach that goes significantly beyond the barrier of 10 % error rate .
